episodes.title: Caught with my trousers down!
episodes.description:
📺 EP 2 | Caught with my trousers down! | The Simon Brodkin Show  

New episodes drop every other Thursday 🔥

Unfiltered, unscripted, and totally unleashed - Simon Brodkin’s new YouTube series is chaotic, hilarious, and unlike anything you’ve seen before.  

👉 Don’t miss a moment - hit Subscribe & turn on the 🔔 to catch every episode:  https://www.youtube.com/c/SimonBrodkin?sub_confirmation=1  
---

🎤 About Simon  

Simon Brodkin has made headlines around the world with his iconic stunts, created hit comedy characters such as Lee Nelson and Jason Bent, and is now breaking records on social media with his stand-up comedy clips.  

With his electrifying crowd work, Simon is one of the most exciting comedians to see live. His recent 170-date international *Screwed Up* tour was extended four times due to amazing demand, culminating in three packed nights at London’s 3,500-seat Hammersmith Apollo.  

Simon has one of the largest social media followings of any British comedian, with his videos routinely getting millions of views, and broke records with a stand-up clip about climate change that has been watched more than 80 million times.  

You'll recognise Simon from photographs with some of the world’s most powerful people - showering disgraced FIFA boss Sepp Blatter with dollar bills, handing British Prime Minister Theresa May a P45, and surrounding President Donald Trump with swastika-emblazoned golf balls.  

Simon wrote and starred in three enormously popular BBC series as Lee Nelson and has had countless other TV appearances, including hosting ‘Live at the Apollo’, ‘Sunday Night at the Palladium’ and a headline-grabbing star turn at the ‘Royal Variety Performance’ which had Will and Kate in stitches.  

---
